about_the_game:
Welcome to Manacircle(Demo). this game is a combat adventure game about exploring the deep unknown and solve the problem in a way.

Our heroine Clair is trying to find the representative of Costoria with her new mysterious partner Player.
But when she takes a step into the deep unknown, new faces with new trouble on the way and she needs to solve the problem in a way that only she can do.

((Warning : Game contains imagery that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy or similar condition, careful.))

Planned Features :

  • Explore the unknown territory.
  • Have a meeting with new charming faces.
  • Fight, Fight, Fight!!!
  • Collect rings and make yourself stronger.
  • Find the true meaning of Manacircle...?
